DESCRIPTION: DANGEROUS! Use this command to remove all data associated with your account or your server.
EXTENDED_LINE_1: **{{prefix}}reset** ~ ⚠️ `DANGEROUS!` Use this command to remove all data associated with your account or your server.
EXTENDED_LINE_2: ⚠️ `If used in DM with the bot`, this will erase all your custom settings and anything related to you in the database. Notice: This does not remove guild data regarding your account, for example any mod logs you have will remain until that guild chooses to remove them.
EXTENDED_LINE_3: ⚠️ `If used in a server(owner only)`, this will erase all your custom settings and anything related to your server in the database.
EXTENDED_LINE_4: ⚠️ This can not be undone❗❗❗ Once data is removed it is gone forever.
ALIASES: Reset does not have any aliases.
OWNER_ONLY: Only the server owner can reset a guild.
GUILD_RESET: Who are you? What are you? Where am I? All information related to this server has been removed.
